FlavorTextOption.Text: Our survey teams are reporting that there has been a sudden spike in the number of Anomalies being found. They think they are the first to discover this trend but it is likely that other races will notice soon.
We must inform our allies of this to assure that these items fall into the right hands. [COLOR=BenevolentBlue](Benevolent +15)[/COLOR]
Excellent! We should boost the production of our survey ships to take advantage of the situation. [COLOR=PragmaticGold](Pragmatic +15)[/COLOR]
We should target and destroy enemy survey ships so we can claim the anomalies for ourselves. [COLOR=WarRed](Malevolent +15)[/COLOR]
